title: About Us Team Extractor
description: Find a company website's About/Team/Leadership page and extract names, job titles, and emails.

startUrls.title: Company websites
startUrls.description: List of company homepages or domains to process.

maxCompanies.title: Max companies
maxCompanies.description: Hard limit for how many input websites will be processed.

maxTeamPageCandidates.title: Max team page candidates
maxTeamPageCandidates.description: How many About/Team/Leadership page candidates to try per company (from homepage links and common paths).

roleIncludeKeywords.title: Role include keywords
roleIncludeKeywords.description: If set, only output people whose title contains at least one keyword (case-insensitive). Example: ["Founder", "CEO"].

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: How many pages to process in parallel.
